analysis.description:
ERC721 (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol#3-27) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol#11-12)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol#13-14)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol#14-16)

VirtualGift (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol#54-456) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-approve (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol#224-232)
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol#291-305)
	-transferFrom (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol#308-324)

Reentrancy in VirtualGift.buy (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol#166-176):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(GTO.transferFrom(msg.sender,oldowner,giftStorage[GiftId].price) == true) (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol#170-171)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- GiftIndexToOwners (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol#176)

VirtualGift.withdrawGTO (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-GTO.transfer(owner,GTO.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol)

Reentrancy in VirtualGift.buy (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol#166-176):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(GTO.transferFrom(msg.sender,oldowner,giftStorage[GiftId].price) == true) (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol#170-171)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/15/0xa4b01cc6f2fde9d5d84da419bee4359819ae210b.sol#176)
